name: Lurker's List
description:
**************************************************

This is a completely free and unofficial fan-game. 

The models and concepts that are being used in this game are all either inspired or directly taken from Riot Games.

All of the digital rights belong to Riot Games, Inc.

**************************************************

LURKER'S LIST

Sight clouded by the hunger of Jaull

Guided by the delusions of deep sea

Hunting every sad soul on his list one by one

There is someone lurking in the coast of Bilgewater...

.

-- About the Project --

After watching Arcane and completing Ruined King, I was craving for more Runeterra content. So I decided to a small fan-game about Pyke.

My first goal was to create a small part of Bilgewater and have Pyke lurking in it.

Then I decided to keep it shorter and went with small boss encounters since I was binging souls-like games. I started to design 5 fights.

Right after I was done with 2 of them, Elden Ring released. 

And that's the end of the story basically :)

This is 2/5 of a minimised version of the project I initially planned.  (Ezreal & Cait)

But there are still some cool scenes in it. So I hope you enjoy it <3

.

-- Lore --

Go check out the official lore page of my favourite support :)

https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/pyke/

.

-- Credits --

Just writing down some of the things used in this project if anyone wonders:   

  • Amazing soundtracks are all from Riot Games Music & Riot Forge.
  • Other than Ledros and Pyke, all character models were got from the trailer package Riot Games shared in their 2020 Warriors cinematic post. 
  • Used Polaris for landscape design mainly. 
  • Main menu scene is direct reference to the lore page.

.

-- Further Legal Notice --

I am not affiliated with Riot Games, Inc, the creators of League of Legends. 

League of Legends and its characters are registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. 

As per Riot Game's Terms of Service/EULA, I(the developer of this fan-game) will not profit from this product and will remove it completely upon request.
